allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add SEO metadata and CSV export functionality

- Generate primary keyword, secondary keywords, meta title, and meta description
- Add CSV download with all SEO data columns plus HTML content
- Replace [IMAGE:] placeholders with actual img tags using placehold.co
- Display SEO data in UI before blog preview
- Style SEO section with clean grid layout

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-AI orchestration with WordPress integration

- Add Llama 4 Maverick (via Groq) for intelligent outline generation
- Add Gemini image generation for unique images per section
- Add WordPress REST API integration for image uploads
- Create orchestrator API to coordinate all AI services
- Add WordPress settings UI with connection testing
- Add progress indicator showing generation steps
- Update frontend with orchestration toggle
- Add groq-sdk dependency

Flow: Llama creates outline -> Gemini generates images -> WordPress uploads -> Claude writes content

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix image generation with new @google/genai SDK

- Replace deprecated @google/generative-ai with @google/genai
- Use gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20 with responseModalities for images
- Add Imagen 3.0 fallback for image generation
- Increase timeout to 120s for multiple images

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add AI keyword research and context-aware image generation

- Add Research Keywords button with Gemini-powered SEO analysis
- Add primary/secondary keyword input fields with character counts
- Add meta title and description inputs with validation
- Create /api/research-keywords endpoint for competitor analysis
- Generate context-aware image prompts based on section content
- Images now match section topics (pathway lighting, security, etc.)
- Show AI research insights (competitor analysis, content angles)
- Pass image themes from research to outline and image generation
- Update orchestrator to use user-provided SEO data

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
